lessons.name: Spanish Alphabet and Pronunciation
lessons.description: Learn the Spanish alphabet and basic pronunciation rules, including vowel and consonant sounds.

lessons.name: Greetings and Introductions in Spanish
lessons.description: Learn formal and informal greetings and how to introduce yourself and others in Spanish.

lessons.name: Numbers, Colors, and Days of the Week in Spanish
lessons.description: Essential vocabulary: numbers, colors, days of the week, and months in Spanish.

lessons.name: Basic Spanish Grammar: Nouns and Articles
lessons.description: Introduction to Spanish nouns, gender (masculine and feminine), and articles (definite and indefinite).

lessons.name: The Verb "Ser" (To Be) in Present Tense
lessons.description: Learn the conjugation of the verb "ser" (to be - permanent characteristics) in the present tense and basic uses.

lessons.name: Personal Pronouns and Basic Sentence Structure
lessons.description: Learn Spanish personal pronouns and how to form simple sentences (subject-verb-object).

lessons.name: Basic Questions in Spanish
lessons.description: Learn how to ask basic questions using question words (Quién, Qué, Dónde, Cuándo, Por qué, Cómo).

lessons.name: Vocabulary: Family and Home in Spanish
lessons.description: Expand your vocabulary with words related to family members and parts of the home.

lessons.name: Simple Commands (Informal Tú)
lessons.description: Learn how to give simple commands and instructions using the informal "tú" form.

lessons.name: Beginner Spanish Level Review
lessons.description: Review of all topics covered in the beginner Spanish level.

lessons.name: Review of Beginner and Expanded Greetings/Farewells
lessons.description: Review beginner concepts and learn more diverse greetings, farewells, and polite phrases.

lessons.name: Regular -AR Verb Conjugation in Present Tense
lessons.description: Learn the conjugation patterns of regular -AR verbs in the present tense.

lessons.name: Regular -ER and -IR Verb Conjugation
lessons.description: Learn the conjugation patterns of regular -ER and -IR verbs in the present tense.

lessons.name: The Verb "Estar" (To Be) in Present Tense
lessons.description: Learn the conjugation of "estar" (to be - temporary states and location) and its uses.

lessons.name: Vocabulary: Food and Drink in Spanish
lessons.description: Expand your vocabulary related to food and drinks, and learn how to order in a restaurant.

lessons.name: Adjectives: Agreement and Placement
lessons.description: Learn how to use adjectives, including agreement in gender and number with nouns.

lessons.name: Direct Object Pronouns
lessons.description: Introduction to direct object pronouns (me, te, lo, la, nos, os, los, las).

lessons.name: Describing People in Spanish
lessons.description: Learn vocabulary to describe people's appearance and basic personality traits.

lessons.name: Present Progressive Tense (Estar + Gerund)
lessons.description: Learn how to form the present progressive tense to describe actions happening now.

lessons.name: Elementary Spanish Level Review
lessons.description: Review of all topics covered in the elementary Spanish level.

lessons.name: Review of Elementary and Daily Routines
lessons.description: Review elementary concepts and learn vocabulary to talk about daily routines and schedules.

lessons.name: Stem-Changing Verbs in Present Tense
lessons.description: Learn the conjugation patterns of common stem-changing verbs (e.g., e-ie, o-ue, e-i).

lessons.name: Reflexive Verbs and Pronouns
lessons.description: Introduction to reflexive verbs and reflexive pronouns (me, te, se, nos, os, se).

lessons.name: Indirect Object Pronouns
lessons.description: Learn how to use indirect object pronouns (me, te, le, nos, os, les).

lessons.name: Vocabulary: Hobbies and Free Time Activities
lessons.description: Expand your vocabulary related to hobbies and leisure activities.

lessons.name: The Preterite Tense of Regular Verbs
lessons.description: Introduction to the preterite tense (past simple) for regular -AR, -ER, and -IR verbs.

lessons.name: Comparatives and Superlatives
lessons.description: Learn how to form and use comparative and superlative structures.

lessons.name: The Verb "Gustar" and Similar Verbs
lessons.description: Learn how to use "gustar" and other verbs that function similarly (e.g., encantar, interesar).

lessons.name: Asking for and Giving Directions
lessons.description: Practice asking for and giving directions using appropriate vocabulary and phrases.

lessons.name: Pre-intermediate Spanish Level Review
lessons.description: Review of all topics covered in the pre-intermediate Spanish level.

lessons.name: Review of Pre-intermediate and Thematic Vocabulary Expansion
lessons.description: Review pre-intermediate concepts and expand thematic vocabulary in various areas of daily life.

lessons.name: Preterite Tense of Irregular Verbs
lessons.description: Learn the conjugation of common irregular verbs in the preterite tense.

lessons.name: Imperfect Tense: Uses and Conjugation
lessons.description: Introduction to the imperfect tense (past habitual actions, descriptions).

lessons.name: Preterite vs. Imperfect: Contrasting Past Tenses
lessons.description: Learn when to use the preterite and imperfect tenses based on context.

lessons.name: Vocabulary: Travel and Accommodation (Advanced)
lessons.description: Expand and refine your vocabulary related to travel, accommodation, and booking arrangements.

lessons.name: Double Object Pronouns
lessons.description: Learn to combine direct and indirect object pronouns in the same sentence. Focus on the placement and order of these pronouns, including the use of 'se' when 'le' or 'les' is followed by 'lo', 'la', 'los', or 'las'.

lessons.name: Formal Commands (Usted/Ustedes)
lessons.description: Learn how to form and use formal commands (using the subjunctive mood).

lessons.name: Vocabulary: Work and Study in Spanish
lessons.description: Expand your vocabulary related to work environments, professions, and academic studies.

lessons.name: Introduction to the Subjunctive Mood (Present)
lessons.description: Learn the basic concepts and uses of the present subjunctive (doubt, desire, uncertainty).

lessons.name: Intermediate Spanish Level Review
lessons.description: Review of all topics covered in the intermediate Spanish level.

lessons.name: Review of Intermediate and Complex Grammar Structures
lessons.description: Review intermediate concepts and introduce more complex grammatical structures and sentence constructions.

lessons.name: Subjunctive with Conjunctions (e.g., para que, antes de que)
lessons.description: Learn how to use the subjunctive after specific conjunctions.

lessons.name: Future Tense: Regular and Irregular Verbs
lessons.description: Learn how to form and use the future tense to talk about future actions.

lessons.name: Conditional Tense: Regular and Irregular Verbs
lessons.description: Learn how to form and use the conditional tense to talk about hypothetical situations.

lessons.name: Vocabulary: Business and Finance (Advanced)
lessons.description: Expand and refine your vocabulary related to business, finance, and economics for professional contexts.

lessons.name: Subjunctive with Impersonal Expressions
lessons.description: Learn how to use the subjunctive with impersonal expressions (e.g., es importante que).

lessons.name: Past Subjunctive (Imperfect Subjunctive)
lessons.description: Introduction to the past subjunctive and its uses.

lessons.name: Vocabulary: Technology and Innovation in Spanish (Advanced)
lessons.description: Expand and refine your vocabulary related to technology, innovation, and digital topics.

lessons.name: Passive Voice
lessons.description: Learn how to use the passive voice (ser + past participle) in Spanish.

lessons.name: Upper-intermediate Spanish Level Review
lessons.description: Review of all topics covered in the upper-intermediate Spanish level.

lessons.name: Review of Upper-intermediate and Formal Spanish
lessons.description: Review upper-intermediate concepts and focus on formal Spanish language usage, including register and style.

lessons.name: Present Perfect Subjunctive
lessons.description: Learn how to use the present perfect subjunctive.

lessons.name: Past Perfect Subjunctive (Pluperfect Subjunctive)
lessons.description: Learn how to use the past perfect subjunctive.

lessons.name: Conditional Perfect
lessons.description: Learn how to form and use the conditional perfect to talk about hypothetical situations in the past.

lessons.name: Vocabulary: Current Events and Global Issues (Advanced)
lessons.description: Expand and refine your vocabulary for discussing current events, global issues, and political topics.

lessons.name: Si Clauses (Conditional Sentences)
lessons.description: Master the use of all types of conditional sentences (si clauses).

lessons.name: Reported Speech (Indirect Speech)
lessons.description: Learn how to use reported speech to report what others have said, including tense changes.

lessons.name: Vocabulary: Academic and Professional Writing
lessons.description: Develop specialized vocabulary for academic and professional writing, including essay and report writing.

lessons.name: Spanish Idioms and Figurative Language
lessons.description: Explore and learn common Spanish idioms and figurative language.

lessons.name: Advanced Spanish Level Review
lessons.description: Review of all topics covered in the advanced Spanish level.

lessons.name: Review of Advanced and Linguistic Refinement
lessons.description: Review advanced concepts and focus on linguistic refinement, precision, and stylistic nuance.

lessons.name: Spanish Phonetics and Advanced Pronunciation Practice
lessons.description: Deepen your understanding of Spanish phonetics and practice advanced pronunciation, including regional variations.

lessons.name: Advanced Text Analysis and Interpretation
lessons.description: Develop advanced skills in text analysis and interpretation of complex literary and academic texts.

lessons.name: Spanish for Specific Professional Purposes (Business, Legal, Medical)
lessons.description: Explore specialized Spanish vocabulary and communication styles for specific professional fields.

lessons.name: Spanish Cultural Studies and Intercultural Communication
lessons.description: Study aspects of Hispanic culture, history, and society and develop intercultural communication competence.

lessons.name: Creative Writing and Stylistics in Spanish
lessons.description: Engage in creative writing exercises and explore Spanish stylistics to enhance personal expression.

lessons.name: Advanced Listening Comprehension: Authentic Materials
lessons.description: Improve advanced listening comprehension skills using authentic Spanish materials (news, podcasts, lectures, films).

lessons.name: Spanish Rhetoric and Presentation Skills (Advanced)
lessons.description: Refine Spanish rhetoric and presentation skills for persuasive and effective communication in formal settings.

lessons.name: Translation and Interpretation Spanish-English (Advanced)
lessons.description: Develop advanced translation and interpretation skills between Spanish and English with complex texts and contexts.

lessons.name: Proficiency Spanish Level Final Review and Assessment
lessons.description: Final review of all aspects of the proficiency Spanish level and comprehensive assessment.
